title: I found the PERFECT keyboard
description: Can we truly find the ultimate gaming mechanical keyboard?  Enter for your chance to win a $20,000 gaming PC!  Razer Huntsman Mini keyboard on Amazon:  Razer Huntsman Tournament keyboard on Amazon:  Anne Pro 2 keyboard on Amazon:  Epomaker SK64 keyboard on Amazon:  Massdrop / Drop CTRL keyboard on Amazon:  GMMK Compact keyboard on Amazon:   Best mechanical keyboard 2020  By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel This Is!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
